snippet: GARFINKEL--Howard. Basketball legend, the Garf passed away peacefully on May 7, 2016 at the age of 86. Graveside service at Mt. Lebanon Cemetery, Glendale, Queens, NY on Tuesday, May 10 at 2pm. A celebration of his life will be held at Clyde's Frazier's (485 10th Ave.) on Friday, May 20 at 6pm (donation required), with funds going to a camp scholarship in Garf's name. Donations may be made to Five Star Foundation, 101 W. Jefferson St., Rockville, MD 20850. 1/3
